page.title: 02SURVEYS
page.content: We surveyed 66 people, 31 male 35 female. In the evenings two thirds went out, many played sports , others went to the pub or for a meal. Those who stayed in watched T.V. or read, some did household jobs and two people had to go to work. Documentaries and soap operas were most popular on T.V. Many read a news paper regularly. The Daily Mail and Express were the most popular. About half the people read magazines.Womans Weekly was the most popular. Many people read books, most read novels. About two thirds watched some live sport. The most popular was football. Less than half the people played sports. Swimming and badmington were the favourites. Half went to dances, most prefered disco.
